column8: Description
Fast-firing archer that rains arrows upon your enemies' heads.
Throws javelins at enemies that do great damage.
Remarkably long shooting range while sacrificing close combat abilities.
Focuses on one enemy and increases damage for every hit against that target.
Unable to strike enemies nearby but the ones further away are susceptible to his poison attacks.
Stuns enemies.
Smites the Undead with divine light; 0.5x damage against all other enemies.
Fries multiple enemies with cascades of supercharged plasma.
Zaps foes with lightning bolts that penetrate armor.
An electrical specialist with a far-reaching chain of lightning to zap an unlucky foe nearby.
Cheap and cheerful, their snowballs pack a wallop.
Reveals hidden units and blasts them with eldritch light.
Throws magical darts at enemies that extract extra mana.
Long-range marksman whose shot is deadly but slow to reload.
Burns the strongest enemy in range with a devastating beam of light.
Shines a devastating beam of light to the strongest enemy in range, damaging close-by units as well.
Unleashes volleys of explosive bolts at your foes.
Grows in power as it swallows the souls of its victims.
Targets random enemies with high-impact blowfishes.
Spews balls of molten rock at random enemies.
Riddle your enemies with explosive shells.
A witch who throws flasks of toxic brew upon the enemy.
Lobs bombs that deal area damage.
Heavy artillery with a wide blast area.
Long range tower with explosive fireworks ammunition.
Slows enemy units to a crawl.
Slows down groups of enemies.
Generates extra Mana to boost your battle power.
Raises skeletons from killed enemies to fight for you.
Conjure up Mana from thin air.
Scorch enemies with armor-penetrating dragon fire.
Summon a plague dragon that breathes poisonous dragon fire.
Scorch your enemies with a firebreathing Dragon that deals massive area damage.
Snaps a single enemy in its jaws when stepped on.
Call in a thunderstorm that rains bolts of lightning down on your enemies.
Fires a barrage of heavy artillery rounds at the enemy.
Plant a poison ward that infects any enemy passing by.
Set the ground on fire and burn all enemies who are dumb enough to try to cross it.
Erupts in a cloud of poison when stepped on.
Explodes when enemies get too close.
Plant a big bomb that lights its fuse when an enemy nears it.
Call down a deadly deluge of blades.
Blanket the battlefield in a cleansing rain of destruction.
Slam a meteor into a pile of enemies.
Does major damage against the strongest enemies on the battlefield.
Swat enemies like they were flies with a mighty fist from the skies.
Summon a trio of troops to fight at your side.
Summon 7 warriors to fight at your side.
Deploy a squad to deal with any threat.
Summon a surly Thunder Moose to fight at your side.
Summon a Lightning Goose to fight at your side.
Plant a tribal totem that makes nearby Heroes hit harder.
Snap-freeze enemies in a giant block of ice.
Raise a stone guardian that teleports enemies backward.
Freezes all enemies for a short while.
Slows down enemies who set foot in its circle.
Downsize your enemies to have them receive more damage.
A vicious stream of electricity that jumps from foe to foe.
Darken the entire battlefield with the fury of the thunder god to strike multiple enemies.
A fearless knight encased in armor from head to toe.
A nimble crocodile-hunter who shrugs off poison.
A menacing samurai who's fearsome in a melee.
A nimble ninja who can slip across the battlefield in the blink of an eye.
A thrilla and a chilla - this big bruiser lets his icy fists do the talking.
Wields venomous blades and is highly resistant to Poison.
Fragile in close combat but a deadly shot with a bow.
A mystic shaman who mauls his enemies with Magical spirit animals.
A dastardly card-sharp who steals Mana from her victims.
A powerful seer who conjures spirits from beyond and reveals what is hidden.
A wicked fireball throwing witch.
A mighty paladin who boosts the damage of nearby allies.
A lumbering beast who can shake off even the most grievous wounds.
A crack shot with a rifle - she's the one granny you don't wanna cross.
A relentless undead warrior who's highly resistant to Magic.
Haughty warrior-prince of the draconic Order of the Spear.
Born in the magma cauldrons of the deep and filled with fiery vengeance.
Wields a mighty hammer to cause damage even to the nearby enemies of the initial target.
A robotic rust-bucket who's born to roll. Packs a mighty mortar.
An ancient giant of tremendous power.
A trusty infantry sword, quick and stabby.
A white-hot magical blade.
A heavy-hitting halberd with a ponderous swing.
A staff that smites enemies with bursts of magical light.
A towering scarlet scimitar forged in the cold fires of the Vermilion Foundry.
A sword carved from a shard of crystal that crackles with magic energy.
A vicious cutlass that drips with venom.
Sturdy metal helmet that keeps the wearer's skull intact.
Winged helmet that protects the wearer from magical attacks.
Legendary crested helm that deflects both magical and physical damage.
A sinister chapeau that lets its wearer see the invisible.
A stout wooden shield that fends off physical blows.
An enchanted shield that deflects magic attacks.
A heavy shield that trades speed for protection.
Legendary shield from the ancient forges of the Vermilion Foundry.
Tough studded leather armor that protects the wearer from physical blows.
Made from dragon scales that deflect magic and physical damage.
Legendary suit of antique armor that fortifies the wearer against poison.
Sturdy boots with a steel-capped toe, perfect for kicking butt.
Red-hot booties that let the wearer run like the wind.
Boots that quicken the wearer's pace and boost their health.
Pan-dimensional footwear that warps you across the battlefield in style.
Powerful totem that fortifies the wearer's life force.
A ring of power that gradually heals the wearer.
A potent ring that strengthens the wearer's sword arm.
A treacherous belt that generates Mana by feeding on its wearer.
